item.title: What do you want to do?
item.description: In this video, Gary V talks about two P's - Patience and Passion.

item.title: Gain Clarity: 6 Questions to answer before you buy white label content
item.description: Do you use white label content. The smart professionals that use these types of products know how it can speed up your workflow and save money.

item.title: Content Creation Collection Toolbox Launched!
item.description: I am pleased to be a part of the content creation collection toolbox this year.

item.title: A Savory Way to Approach Your New Year's Resolutions This Year
item.description: The Fresh Start Effect is in full steam. More than a dozen people have asked me what my resolutions for 2019 are.

item.title: Get Up - Eat - Run
item.description: “Then he lay down and slept under the broom tree. But as he was sleeping, an angel touched him and told him, “Get up and eat.

item.title: Busy Person's Guide to Content Planning for 2017
item.description: I gave a presentation at my meetup group this past week. I wanted to help facilitate members through the process of planning their content calendar for 2017.

item.title: The Pomodoro Technique - Can you use it at work?
item.description: Life hackers love it or hate it.
